reviews.review_msg: Professor Ismaeil is a tough grader, however personally I believe this for your own improvement in writing and reading skills, if you want to thoroughly learn how to write very good essays, response papers and summaries, he is definitely a good person to learn from.

Gets angry very fast. Very unsympathetic to students who came late due to late bus. Very Very tough marker. You think FAL X99 is a GPA booster, but not with this prof. Every single other FAL X99 class have much higher GPA of around B or B+ because their standards are much lower.
